BNC User Reference Guide

<date>

date contains a date in any format.
Class model.dateLike model.publicationStmtPart
Declaration 
element date { attribute value { data.temporal }?, macro.phraseSeq }
Attributes
(In addition to global attributes)
value supplies a standardized representation of the date.
Status: Optional
Datatype (1–1) data.temporal
Example
 <date value="1991-02-16"
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">1991-02-16</date>
Example
 <date value="1989"
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">1989</date>
; ; ; ; ;
